title: If mixed user other than 3 above along with star category hotel is proposed subject to fulfillment of road width for such mix use, then no additional FSI will be available at concessional rate
clause_text: If mixed user other than 3 above along with star category hotel is proposed subject to fulfillment of road width for such mix use, then no additional FSI will be available at concessional rate. Separate entrances, Parking arrangements, lifts/ Lobbies shall be provided to segregate such mix uses.
section: 33(4) Building of Residential Hotels on independent plot:

source_pdf.text_snippet: If mixed user other than 3 above along with star category hotel is proposed subject to fulfillment of road width for such mix use, then no additional FSI will be available at concessional rate. Separa
